title: Cedzy
author: Cedzy
content: We are seeking a highly skilled fullstack web developer for an exciting crypto project.Requirements:Fluent in German OR excellent English communication skills.Non-anonymous individuals only.Willingness to sign a contract.Availability for weekly video chat meetings.Backend:Expertise in JavaScript (Node.js) for server-side development.Knowledge of databases such as MySQL, MongoDB, or PostgreSQL.Ability to design RESTful APIs.Experience with cryptography and blockchain integration.Infrastructure and Deployment:Experience with cloud platforms like AWS or Azure.Proficiency in containerization using Docker.Understanding of Continuous Integration and Deployment (CI/CD) practices.In addition to these technical skills, we value problem-solving abilities, effective teamwork, excellent communication skills, and a passion for continuous learning. Please note that the provided information is a general overview, and specific project requirements and preferences may vary.*There is no upfront payment. Everyone of the team will receive shares of total team token.Contact:On discord: 410496355123855371 or CedzyEmail: info@boleka.co

comments.author: Latviand
comments.body: Are the team paid only in tokens? Or that's an incentive besides being paid with cold hard cash or bitcoin? Kind of difficult for you to get an application if they're only getting paid with your crypto which is not viable especially if there's no valuations for your token yet. Also, you need to move this to Services if you are hiring a developer. There should be a salary my guy if you want someone to take this hiring seriously.
